title: The Twitter Accounts Of El Chapo's Sons Are Just As Ridiculous As Their Facebook Ones
content:
A while ago we showed you the Facebook account of notorious Mexican drug lord Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman’s son, Ivan Archiivaldo Guzman. 
 
His Dad is one of the most wanted men in the world after he escaped from Altiplano jail in July (the second major breakout of his time in incarceration). It is considered the most secure of Mexico's federal prisons. 
 
But his sons have never kept a low profile themselves, posting outrageous pictures of cash, cars and guns that look like they could be straight out of a gangster flick. 
 
And it doesn’t stop at Facebook. Take a look at these tweets from Ivan and Alfredo. 
  
Por si andas con el pendiente mujeres son las que me sobran pic.twitter.com/KB3jwMl5mo 

— Alfredo Guzmán (@AlfreditoGuzma) August 8, 2013   
Casa llena pic.twitter.com/W7Wm79qbc3 

— Ivan Guzman (@Ivan_Guzman_) August 27, 2014   
Inchee gatitoooo pic.twitter.com/LN9SzuhNf9 

— Alfredo Guzmán (@AlfreditoGuzma) March 20, 2014   
Amachinando aqui nomas agustinnn pic.twitter.com/R0Hvee03UZ 

— Alfredo Guzmán (@AlfreditoGuzma) March 16, 2014
